product_name: Icebreaker Everyday Half-Zip Long Underwear Top - Women's
long_description: Featuring a zipper to help you control your comfort, the women's Icebreaker Everyday half-zip long underwear top uses lightweight merino wool to ensure you stay warm when it's cool outside. Made of soft, nonirritating merino wool, the Icebreaker Everyday half-zip top offers lightweight warmth and resists odors naturally. Merino wool wicks away moisture, dries quickly and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in a variety of conditions. Fabric offers protection from UV light with a rating of UPF 50+. Machine washable; line dry or dry flat in shade. The women's Icebreaker Everyday half-zip long underwear top has a slim fit.
short_description: Featuring a zipper to help you control your comfort, the women's Icebreaker Everyday half-zip long underwear top uses lightweight merino wool to ensure you stay warm when it's cool outside.
